text: Motion
Motion
Morning
Ah, Good morning...!
Motion
Motion
─Um, are those... the lyrics for the new song?

Yeah, I was thinking about how to
express the dialogue in the song.

─In the new song, Mikoto-san portrays a girl
who is struggling with love... right?
It's very... well, pretty intense...
Yeah.

─Are they, friends?
The other person here is giving "me" advice.

…………
My character here sounds quite sassy, doesn't she!

─Haha,
I wonder if that's how people see me, huh?
Motion
─Have you ever had any similar experiences before?
─Eh!

Ah, Um... Are you asking me if i've ever been
consulted about love before?
Yeah.

Let's see... Ah, right...
─Haha, I wonder.
It's hard, isn't it, giving advice on love?

...I guess so.
Yeah, it's difficult, no?
─While reading the lyrics, I was recalling a bit.
That I've had a similar experience a long time ago.
